Binding.name: INVERTMOUSELOOK
Binding.description: Inverts mouselook while the key is being held.

Bindings.Binding: if keystate == "down" then WoodysToolkit.LockInvert() elseif keystate == "up" then MouselookHandler.LockRevert() end

Binding.name: TOGGLEMOUSELOOK
Binding.description: Toggles the default mouselook state on key up.

Binding.name: LOCKMOUSELOOK
Binding.description: Lock the mouselook state on key up.

Binding.name: UNLOCKMOUSELOOK
Binding.description: Unlock the mouselook state on key up.
